name: Deep Space (itch) (PurpleBat Games!)
description:
This game is based on the Shooter Tutorial from Unity.

I´m trying to add as many mechanics as i can to make a new game on top of the tutorial. For now it´s only running for Android, and it only has one level, because it´s still a prototype. 

I´m thinking about making a bullet hell shooter, ou a simple shooter with some new mechanics and itens. 


Have Fun and Leave your feedback.
